Pre-Game Insights: England will kick off their first tour of Pakistan in 17 years with the first of a seven-match Twenty20 series.
Jos Buttler will miss the Karachi leg due to a knee injury, and Moeen Ali will lead the side.
Moeen Ali expressed that playing in front of Pakistani crowds and captaining England is an immense honor.
The series is crucial for both teams as a preparation for the World Cup in Australia next month.
At least 10 members of the current England squad have experience of local conditions from their Pakistan Super League stints.
Alex Hales is keen to impress after a three-year absence from international cricket.
Pakistan will look to improve their batting approach and address Babar Azam’s slump in form.
